body.query: FROM test | sort emp_no | eval x1 = concat(ip1, ip2), x2 = coalesce(x1, "255.255.255.255"), x3 = to_ip(x2) | keep emp_no, x*

Only first 20 failures recorded.", 299 Elasticsearch-9.0.0-1b4f5eb36d06bd0ef8f517b4f8653e5dc253ecd7 "Line 1:98: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: '127.00.1' is not an IP string literal."
